com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.mock
Class MockController

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.Controller
      com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.AbstractSunriseController
          com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.mock.MockController

public class MockController
extends AbstractSunriseController

Mock controller class. Can be used to do some tests without a real controller.

This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

onDispose

protected void onDispose()
Called when this controller get's disposed. Use this method to dispose controller specific stuff.

This method is the first method called during disposing of a controller. The concrete controller still has all initialized things available.

ControllerServices will get disposed automatically.

Overrides:
onDispose in class Controller
This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.
